Note: Title supplied by cataloger. Date based on dates of 1st World War. Art work attributed to Spencer Pryse. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: A triptych of women. The largest, in the middle of the poster is of a nursing mother and child reminiscent of the "Belgian Madonna." No text.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: Place of publication not identified : publisher not identified
